Articles.Content:
Dear fellow Kerbonauts!
 

Let me present you a book (well, it's an E-book after all) what I wrote in the end of the end of the last year (2017), called

 

It's actually a (more-or-less) simple story based on the Carrier mode of KSP from the first sounding rockets to the first Minmus landing.

I discussed with @Darth Badie earlier, she agreed and supported me to do it.

This book is completely free-of-charge,  all credits to SQUAD.

 

I'd like to ask you to read it, and if you like, leave me comments with your opinions, because sometimes in the future I'd like to write another KSP-themed book if the new EULA let me do it.

 

Anyways, here is the link for the promo video I made for the book. The link of the book is in the description of the video.

I hope you'll like it.

 

Cheers!
